@ eXg.SunTzu
download dos-box
its a dos emulator and makes the games run perfectly
unpack the game, and put it in C:
find the filename of the installer

start up dos-box and enter this:
>MOUNT C C:/
>C:
>CD "FOLDER" (this opens the game's folder)
>"FILENAME"

so when i run wolfenstein 3d, i type:
>MOUNT C C:/
>C:
>CD WOLF3D
>WOLF3D

hope this helps!!!!

This is fuckin' bullshit....

C:\WOLFSRC\WOLF3D.EXE
The NTVDM CPU has encountered an illegal instruction.
CS:0100 IP:0346 OP:fe 50 06 df 02 Choose 'Close' to terminate the application.

BULLSHIT, DO NOT DOWNLOAD.  
Scanned with NORTON amillion times, no viruses popped but this program just does not work.

works great, extract the rar file, get a virtual drive such as virtual clone drive, mount the iso image in your virtual drive

explore the 'cd' and look for the setup up application, install it into an easily typed location on your hard drive, I put mine in c:wolfenstein3d (note the original file name is wolfenstein 3d, but i couldn't get my dosbox to mount it with the space)

get your dosbox program running and enjoy.

for help with using dosbox just check their site.

Thank you Nemesis6434
